query:
WITH latest_tick AS (
                    SELECT time, last_price as price
                    FROM price_ticks
                    ORDER BY time DESC
                    LIMIT 1
                ),
                latest_history AS (
                    SELECT time, value as price
                    FROM price_history
                    ORDER BY time DESC
                    LIMIT 1
                )
                SELECT time, price
                FROM (
                    SELECT time, price FROM latest_tick
                    UNION ALL
                    SELECT time, price FROM latest_history
                ) combined
                ORDER BY time DESC
                LIMIT 1
